Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, & 95th; WB: 95th, into Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, & 95th near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, into Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 108 Halsted/95th buses rerouted NB: Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, and Halsted; SB: Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th, due to street blockage at 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, and Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, into Terminal; WB: 95th, into Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, & 95th nr 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and into Terminal.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 59th/Bishop
ShortDescription: Eastbound 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Ashland, 63rd, Racine and 59th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
